items.question: What is your name?
items.answer: My name is Muhammad Awais Asad. You can call me M Awais Asad. I'm a Full Stack Developer specializing in Laravel, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

items.question: What is your email address?
items.answer: My email address is awaisasad20@gmail.com. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to discuss projects or collaboration opportunities.

items.question: What is your phone number?
items.answer: You can contact me at +92-332-4255688. I'm available for discussions about projects or potential collaborations.

items.question: Where are you located?
items.answer: I'm located in Lahore, Pakistan. My address is Building no 88, Sector C, Askari 11, Lahore, Pakistan.

items.question: What is your date of birth?
items.answer: My date of birth is July 17, 1994.

items.question: What do you do?
items.answer: I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer with 6+ years of experience. I specialize in building scalable and secure web applications using technologies like Laravel, Vue.js, Node.js, and I also integrate AI-powered features such as chatbots and automation workflows.

items.question: What are your skills?
items.answer: My technical skills include PHP, JavaScript, Laravel, Vue.js, Node.js, Express.js, Inertia.js, Alpine.js, AI integration, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), MySQL, Sequelize, Redis, Git, and Docker. I focus on full-stack development with backend-centric systems.

items.question: What programming languages do you know?
items.answer: I'm proficient in PHP and JavaScript, which are my primary programming languages. I use PHP for Laravel backend development and JavaScript for both frontend (Vue.js) and backend (Node.js) development.

items.question: What frameworks do you use?
items.answer: I work with Laravel (PHP framework), Vue.js and Inertia.js (frontend frameworks), Node.js and Express.js (JavaScript frameworks), Bootstrap (CSS framework), and Alpine.js. I'm experienced in building modern full-stack applications with these technologies.

items.question: How many years of experience do you have?
items.answer: I have 6+ years of professional experience as a full-stack software engineer, building scalable and secure web applications across diverse domains.

items.question: What is your current position?
items.answer: I'm currently working as a Senior Software Developer at Heuristic Sol Pvt Ltd in Lahore, since August 2022. I'm leading the development of Version 2 of a platform, working on SSO solutions, and building modern applications with Laravel, Vue.js, and Inertia.js.

items.question: What companies have you worked for?
items.answer: I've worked at Heuristic Sol Pvt Ltd (Senior Software Developer, Aug 2022 - Present), TechOrix PVT LTD (Team Lead, Feb 2021 - Aug 2022), MST Developers (Full Stack Developer, June 2019 - Jan 2021), and Vroozi INC (Full Stack Developer Intern, Mar 2019 - May 2019), all based in Lahore, Pakistan.

items.question: What is your education?
items.answer: I have a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from University of The Punjab, Lahore (2014-2018). I also completed F.Sc. Pre-Engineering from Punjab College, Lahore (2012-2014) and Matriculation from Jinnah Grammar School, Lahore (2010-2012).

items.question: What is your university degree?
items.answer: I have a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from University of The Punjab, Lahore, which I completed from 2014 to 2018.

items.question: What projects have you worked on?
items.answer: I've worked on various projects including E-KYC System (Backend Development), Chauffeur Taxi Booking System (Full Stack Development), POS System (Full Stack Development), SSO platform with multi-portal support, and many other web applications. I've completed 50+ projects serving over 100 happy clients.

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: I offer Full Stack Web Development, Backend Development, REST API creation, Third Party Integrations (payment gateways, social login, etc.), Database Management Systems (DBMS), and Product Strategy services.

items.question: Do you do freelancing?
items.answer: Yes, I'm available for freelancing! With over 6 years of professional experience, I specialize in delivering high-quality web development services. Whether you need a complete project build or help meeting deadlines, I'm ready to assist. You can contact me at awaisasad20@gmail.com to discuss your project.

items.question: What is your LinkedIn profile?
items.answer: You can find me on LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/in/awais-asad/. You can also find me on GitHub at https://github.com/awais-asad-hsol, Facebook, and Instagram.

items.question: What databases do you work with?
items.answer: I work with MySQL as my primary database system. I'm experienced in database design, optimization, and using Sequelize as an ORM. I also work with Redis for caching and session management.

items.question: Do you work with AI?
items.answer: Yes, I have hands-on experience integrating AI-powered features such as chatbots, automation workflows, and AI agents into applications. I continuously apply current engineering practices to build future-ready software solutions.

items.question: What cloud platforms do you use?
items.answer: I work with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for cloud services and deployment. I also have experience with Docker for containerization.

items.question: What is your GitHub profile?
items.answer: You can find my GitHub profile at https://github.com/awais-asad-hsol. I use Git for version control and have experience with various Git workflows.

items.question: What backend technologies do you use?
items.answer: I specialize in backend development using PHP with Laravel framework and JavaScript with Node.js and Express.js. I build secure RESTful APIs, authentication systems including SSO, and scalable backend architectures.

items.question: What frontend technologies do you use?
items.answer: I work with Vue.js and Inertia.js for building modern, reactive frontends. I also use Alpine.js for lightweight interactivity, Bootstrap for styling, and traditional HTML/CSS. I focus on creating seamless SPA-like experiences.

items.question: How can I hire you?
items.answer: I'm available for freelancing and collaboration! You can reach out to me via email at awaisasad20@gmail.com or call me at +92-332-4255688. I'd be happy to discuss your project requirements and how I can help you achieve your goals.

items.question: How many projects have you completed?
items.answer: I've completed 50+ projects and served over 100 happy clients throughout my 6+ years of professional experience.

items.question: What is your specialization?
items.answer: I specialize in full-stack development with a focus on backend-centric systems. My expertise includes API design, authentication and authorization systems (including SSO), Laravel and Vue.js development, and integrating AI-powered features. I build scalable, secure, and production-ready applications.
